body_html:
What do you think about a slightly more procedural way of doing declaring this data, like this:

static recipeMetadata = {
  'show-heartbeat': recipe => [{ label: 'Survey ID', value: recipe.surveyId }],  
};

I think this is a little more direct and easier to understand, and also a bit more flexible if we want to pull more complex data out of recipes (such as values in the filter expression).
